--- layout: apidoc title: Tile5 API Documentation ---

T5.Drawable

The T5.Shape class is simply a template class that provides placeholder methods that need to be implemented for shapes that can be drawn in a T5.ShapeLayer.

Constructor

new T5.Drawable(params);

#### Initialization Parameters

animate(fn, argsStart, argsEnd, opts)

drag(dragData, dragX, dragY, drop)

draw(renderer, drawData)

The draw method is provided for custom drawables. Internal drawables will delegate their drawing to the function that is returned from the various prep* methods of the renderer, however, when building some applications this really isn't suitable and more is required. Thus if required a custom draw method can be implemented to implement the required functionality.

getProps(renderer, state)

Get the drawable item properties that will be passed to the renderer during the prepare and draw phase

resync(view)

rotate(value)

scale(value)

translate(x, y)

updateBounds(bounds: XYRect, updateXY: boolean)
